Procedure.name: setupCCB
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=CCB servoSetup=CCB receiversSetup=CCB chooseBackend=TotalPower initialize=CCB device=0 calOff restFrequency=0 azelOffsets=0d,0d

Procedure.name: setupKKG
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=KKG servoSetup=KKG receiversSetup=KKG receiversMode=SINGLEDISH chooseBackend=TotalPower initialize=KKG device=0 calOff restFrequency=0 azelOffsets=0d,0d

Procedure.name: setupLLP
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=LP servoSetup=LLP receiversSetup=LLP receiversMode=XXC4 chooseBackend=TotalPower initialize=LLP device=0 calOff restFrequency=0 azelOffsets=0d,0d

Procedure.name: setupPPP
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=LP servoSetup=PPP receiversSetup=PPP receiversMode=C3XX chooseBackend=TotalPower initialize=PPP device=0 calOff restFrequency=0 azelOffsets=0d,0d

Procedure.name: setupPLP
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=LP servoSetup=PLP receiversSetup=PLP receiversMode=C3C4 chooseBackend=TotalPower initialize=PLP device=0 calOff restFrequency=0 azelOffsets=0d,0d

Procedure.name: setupXB
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=XB servoSetup=XB receiversSetup=CCB chooseBackend=TotalPower initialize=XB device=0 restFrequency=0 setLO=7500 azelOffsets=0d,0d

Procedure.name: setupSSP
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=LP servoSetup=SSP receiversSetup=CCB chooseBackend=TotalPower initialize=PPP device=0 calOff restFrequency=0 azelOffsets=0d,0d

Procedure.name: telescopePark
Procedure.body: goTo=180d,89.8d waitOnSource antennaStop wait=1 antennaPark receiversPark servoPark asPark logMessage=Telescope is now parked
